Member LoginBecome a Member

Become a Member

Join over 150 companies driving Zimbabwe's industrial transformation. Access exclusive resources, advocacy, and networking opportunities.

Membership Benefits

Comprehensive support for your business growth and operational excellence.

Policy Advocacy
Strong representation in government policy discussions and regulatory frameworks.
Networking Opportunities
Connect with industry leaders, partners, and stakeholders at exclusive events.
Labour Relations Support
Access to CBAs, wage agreements, dispute resolution services, and HR templates.
Business Intelligence
Industry reports, market data, sector statistics, and research publications.
Export Development
Market access programs, trade missions, and export competitiveness support.
Training & Development
Workshops, seminars, and capacity building programs for your workforce.

Membership Options

Choose the membership level that best fits your organization.

Associate Member
For emerging companies and SMEs in the engineering sector
Contact Us
  • Access to industry reports
  • Event participation
  • Newsletter subscription
  • Basic networking opportunities
Apply Now
Most Popular
Full Member
For established companies in engineering, iron & steel
Contact Us
  • All Associate benefits
  • Policy advocacy representation
  • Labour relations support
  • Member directory listing
  • Priority event access
  • Voting rights
Apply Now
Corporate Member
For large enterprises and industry leaders
Contact Us
  • All Full Member benefits
  • Board representation opportunity
  • Strategic advisory access
  • Premium branding visibility
  • Custom support services
  • Exclusive stakeholder meetings
Apply Now

How to Join

Simple process to become part of Zimbabwe's leading industrial association.

1

Submit Application

Complete the membership application form online or download it.

2

Review Process

Our team reviews your application and company credentials.

3

Board Approval

Application is presented to the board for final approval.

4

Welcome Aboard

Receive membership certificate and access to member portal.

Membership Application

Fill out the form below and our team will contact you within 2 business days.

Explore Our Member Directory

Browse our comprehensive directory of member companies across Zimbabwe's engineering and steel sector.
